original_text:
He makes me lie down in green pastures.
He leads me beside still waters.
korean_text: 그가 나를 푸른 풀밭에 누이시며 쉴 만한 물 가로 인도하시는도다

sentences.original_text: He makes me lie down in green pastures.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 나를 푸른 초장에 눕게 하십니다.

sentences.original_text: He leads me beside still waters.
